faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Most of the users ask these questions. Need help?
faq.q1: What can I expect from DocNote's core features?
faq.a1: DocNote offers AI-powered recording, real-time transcription with 99% accuracy for medical terminology, automatic SOAP note generation, and seamless EHR integration — all designed to save you 2+ hours of documentation time daily.
faq.q2: Does DocNote train on patient data?
faq.a2: No. DocNote never uses patient data for AI model training. All recordings and transcriptions are processed securely and deleted after note generation unless you explicitly choose to save them.
faq.q3: Is DocNote compliant with healthcare regulations?
faq.a3: Yes. DocNote is fully HIPAA compliant and ISO 27001 certified. All data is encrypted and stored exclusively on Swiss servers.
faq.q4: Which EHR systems does DocNote integrate with?
faq.a4: DocNote integrates with most major EHR systems including Epic, Cerner, and Swiss-specific systems like Elexis. We also offer custom integration support for enterprise clients.
faq.a5: DocNote supports German, French, Italian, English, and 20+ other languages for both transcription and note generation.
faq.q6: Can I try DocNote for free?
faq.a6: Yes! Start with a 14-day free trial with full access to Professional features. No credit card required.
